name: ianyeo-com
description: Ian Yeo's executive portfolio website with gated report access

scripts.setup: npm run setup:kv && npm run setup:r2
scripts.setup:kv: wrangler kv namespace create REPORT_ACCESS && wrangler kv namespace create REPORT_ACCESS --preview
scripts.setup:r2: wrangler r2 bucket create executive-reports && wrangler r2 bucket create executive-reports-preview
scripts.check:report: wrangler r2 object get executive-reports/executive-report.pdf --file downloaded-report.pdf

author: Ian Yeo <ian@ianyeo.com>
